How do I start a game:
How do I start a game?


  1. Go to the main menu
  2. Click "PLAY"
  3. Select your mode.
How do I change game modes:
How do I change game modes?


  1. Go to the main menu
  2. Click "PLAY"
  3. Select the mode you want.
How do I change the game map:
How do I change the game map?


You cannot change the game map. They are chose randomly so players can find each other easier.
How do I customize my profile:
How do I customize my profile?


  1. Go to the main menu
  2. Click "OPTIONS"
  3. Click "EDIT/VIEW SETTINGS"
  4. Click "Profile settings"
  5. Customize your profile.
How do I invite players:
How do I invite players?


Note: You can only invite players via friending them or directly in the world chat.
  1. Go to the main menu
  2. Click the list icon at the top
  3. Click "World chat"
  4. Select the user by clicking "@"
  5. Click the tag including the user name
  6. Click "Invite to"
  7. Wait for the player to join.
How do I sign up:
How do I sign up?


  1. Go to the main menu
  2. Click "OPTIONS"
  3. Click "LOG IN/SIGN UP"
  4. Click "Don't have an account?"
  5. From there, follow the instructions to sign up.
How do I log in:
How do I log in?


  1. Go to the main menu
  2. Click "OPTIONS"
  3. Click "LOG IN/SIGN UP"
  4. Enter your credentials
How do I buy items:
How do I buy items?


Note: by "buying", we mean fake currency, not real money. You can earn points by playing games and completing tasks to buy items from the store.
  1. Go to the main menu
  2. Click "STORE"
  3. Make sure you are logged in
  4. Buy or sell items.
How do I earn points:
How do I earn points?


You can earn points buy completing tasks, answering daily polls, and playing games. Here we'll show you how to earn points by playing games.
  1. Start a game. Search "How do I start a game?" to learn how to do this.
  2. Complete the game. Losing will still earn you 50 points.
  3. Once you return to the menu, you will earn your points.
